Class.name: IFileIO
Class.summary: Interface defining a contract for basic file operations.

Instance.name: Exists[EntryPath]
Instance.summary: Checks if the specified file exists at the given file path.
Instance.param: The path of the file to check for existence.
Instance.returns: True if the file exists; otherwise, false.

Instance.name: OpenRead[EntryPath]
Instance.summary: Opens the specified file for reading.
Instance.param: The path of the file to open for reading.
Instance.returns: A stream for reading the contents of the file.

Instance.name: OpenWrite[EntryPath]
Instance.summary: Opens the specified file for writing, creating the file if it does not exist.
Instance.param: The path of the file to open for writing.
Instance.returns: A stream for writing to the file.

Instance.name: Rename[EntryPath,EntryPath]
Instance.summary: Renames the file specified by the source file path to the destination file path.
Instance.param: The current path of the file to be renamed.
The new path to which the file should be renamed.
Instance.returns: True if the renaming was successful; otherwise, false.

Instance.name: Delete[EntryPath]
Instance.summary: Deletes the file at the specified file path.
Instance.param: The path of the file to delete.
Instance.returns: True if the file was successfully deleted; otherwise, false.

Instance.name: GetFileTimestamps[EntryPath]
Instance.summary: Gets the creation, last access, and last write timestamps of the specified file.
Instance.param: The path of the file to get timestamps for.

Instance.name: SetFileTimestamps[EntryPath,FileTimestamps]
Instance.summary: Sets the creation, last access, and last write timestamps of the specified file.
Instance.param: The path of the file to set timestamps for.
A object containing the timestamps to set.
Instance.returns: True if the timestamps were successfully set; otherwise, false.

Instance.name: GetFileAttributes[EntryPath]
Instance.summary: Gets the attributes of the specified file.
Instance.param: The path of the file to get attributes for.
Instance.returns: A object representing the attributes of the file.

Instance.name: SetFileAttributes[EntryPath,FileAttributes]
Instance.summary: Sets the attributes of the specified file.
Instance.param: The path of the file to set attributes for.
A object representing the attributes to set.
Instance.returns: True if the attributes were successfully set; otherwise, false.
